TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable PeerApplication extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class PeerApplication Implements IDisposable, IEquatable(Of PeerApplication), ISerializable
type PeerApplication = class interface IDisposable interface IEquatable<PeerApplication> interface ISerializable

summary.span: Represents an application that is available for use with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.

span.span: Represents an application that is available for use with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式是從端點軟體或軟體功能提供一組對等。An application is a set of software or software features available to a peer from an endpoint. 通常，這是指網路功能的軟體套件，例如遊戲或其他共同作業應用程式。Commonly, this refers to network-enabled software packages such as games or other collaborative applications. A定義的軟體應用程式或元件搭配網路。A defines the set of software applications or components available for use with the network. 此網路可讓基礎結構參與者初始化此應用程式的使用方式。This network enables infrastructure participants to initiate usage of this application. 它們可能會起始共同作業工作階段使用這個類別所識別的應用程式。They may initiate a collaboration session using the application identified by this class. 建構此類別的執行個體，並設定適當的內容之後, 這個物件可用於共同作業工作階段。After constructing an instance of this class and setting the appropriate properties, this object may be used in collaboration sessions. 其用途透過將它傳遞給對等共同作業和方法，將會啟用或停用它。Its use is accomplished by passing it to the peer collaboration and methods, which will enable or disable it. 全域唯一和必須先設定這個執行個體的屬性，已成功註冊應用程式。The globally unique and properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered. 註冊應用程式具有對等共同作業基礎結構之後, 註冊資訊會保留在登錄中。After registering an application with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure, the registration information persists in the registry. 這樣可讓應用程式提供共同作業應用程式即使已結束註冊應用程式的程式。This makes the application available to collaboration applications even after the program which registered the application has exited. 變更應用程式執行個體上的屬性，其登錄之後沒有登錄任何作用。Changing the properties on an application instance after it has been registered has no effect on the registration. 若要更新的註冊，應用程式必須取消登錄並再註冊以新的資訊。To update the registration, the application must be unregistered and then registered again with the new information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個事件需要的值為中的對等共同作業工作階段開始時所建立的物件。Use of this event requires a value of in the of the object that was created when the peer collaboration session began.

span.span: Array of data that contain a binary object to associate with the peer application.

value.span: 這通常是小型影像或 XML blob。

span.span: This is commonly a small image or XML blob.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項資料是以自由格式，並提供裝載的對等。This data is free form and is provided by the hosting peer. 可提供資料的最大數量是 4,096 個位元組。The maximum amount of data that can be provided is 4,096 bytes. 這項資料不屬於邀請，但讓本機對等電腦上的應用程式相關聯的額外資料。This data is not part of a invitation, but rather allows additional data to be associated with the application on the local peer.

exception.span: The size of this binary data object is either less than 0 or greater than 4,096 bytes.

span.span: The size of this binary data object is either less than 0 or greater than 4,096 bytes.
